Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Kudos \Ku"dos\ (k[=u]"d[o^]s), n. [NL., fr. Gr. ky^dos glory.] Glory; fame; renown; praise. --W. H. Russel. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Kudos \Ku"dos\, v. t. To praise; to extol; to glorify. ``Kudos'd egregiously.'' [R.] --Southey. [1913 Webster]
kudos n : an expression of approval and commendation; "he always appreciated praise for his work" [syn: {praise}, {congratulations}]
